data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR) With Respect To SEBI Order Dated 2 May 2025 In Respect Of Seya Industries Ltd And Others
data.news_body: SEBI order dated 2 May 2025 in respect of Seya Industries Ltd and others

data.caption: Clarification Sought from Seya Industries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Seya Industries Ltd with reference to the media report appearing on
https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/sebi-imposes-rs-58-5-crore-penalty-on-seya-industries-top-executives-for-financial-fraud-and-fund-diversion/articleshow/120855097.cms (Source: https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com ) dated May 05 2025 titled "Sebi imposes Rs 58.5 crore penalty on Seya Industries top executives for financial fraud and fund diversion".

The Company is requested to submit its clarification to the Exchange in terms of the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Updates on CIRP - Appointment of Forensic Auditor
data.news_body: Interim Resolution Professional of Seya Industries Ltd has informed BSE regarding appointment of Forensic Auditor by the Securities and Exchange Board of India.

data.caption: Initiation of Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process (CIRP)
data.news_body:
Seya Industries Ltd vide announcement dated August 23, 2021, had informed regarding Initiation of Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process. However, company has not submitted the order copy of Hon'ble NCLT in this matter.

Therefore, in interest of stakeholders, please find enclosed the copy of order as available on the website of Hon'ble NCLT.
